detailed_results.notes: Michael Bowman is clearly providing an endorsement, not authorship. The endorsement detector should have caught this.
"we" refers to "my people" (Slovenians) mentioned in the same paragraph. Pronoun resolver should have caught this.
"it" clearly refers to soil/handful of soil from the same sentence. This should have been resolved.
"the way through and out of these challenges" is indeed too abstract. Should extract concrete practices instead.
"the answer" is too vague and context-dependent. This relationship adds no value.
